Description: Should I stay away from my family if I still have to work during the pandemic? I deliver beer to grocery stores and gas stations.. and I’ve been worried about possibly getting it and then them catching it.. since they said you can be asymptotic..
DialogueText:
Patient:
Should I stay away from my family if I still have to work during the pandemic? I deliver beer to grocery stores and gas stations.. and I’ve been worried about possibly getting it and then them catching it.. since they said you can be asymptotic..
Doctor:
In brief:   Difficult times.   This is a difficult question.   Many workers like you wear masks, gloves, stand 6 feet from others, take off work clothes on entering their home, wash meticulously. Read more tips from Covid19 hotlines.  Would you like to video or text chat with me?
